description: Singapore zoo is one of my favourites. The layout is good and there is lots of shade for visitors to cool down under plus convenient seats to take advantage of. The animal enclosures are well maintained and keep clean. Animals look healthy and well looked...More
title: Zoo visit

description: The zoo is well maintained and animals seems happy and well taken care of. There a lot of activities inside and foods too. Recommended place to visit.
title: Night environmental fun!

description: Visited the zoo yesterday. Well worth the money. I booked it with the river safari experience as well. The zoo is so clean and you can see the animals up close. The breakfast with the orangutans was quite good. Lots of variety. The zoo keeper...More
title: Superb

description: We enjoyed our trip to Singapore Zoo, but someone we were disappointed with night safari where we saw a lot of different buffalos. Tiger slept. We felt bird park lory loft is much better that Zoo.
title: Few places in zoo are good

description: The zoo provides mobility scooters but to rent one costs more than the price of the entrance fee, essentially doubling the cost for disabled visitors. SHAME ON YOU SINGAPORE ZOO!!! Considering the huge volumes of people passing through here every day the zoo could well...More
title: Disabled visitor? Bring twice as much money as it will cost you twice as much...

description: Not a favourite of mine visiting zoos but this was exceptional day out. Really loved it. It was a long day trying to see it all.
title: ZOO visit

title: Panda Panda Panda

title: unexpected and amazing experience!

title: You can find animals well

description: What an amazing zoo.the animals look healthy and happy with huge enclosures.The animal shows are wonderful and very enjoyable.You hve to visit this zoo
title: The best zoo ever

description: The Zoo is amazing. Bring comfortable shoes for walking as there is a lot to see. The zoo offers animals shows but they get very busy, but if you can get to the Giraffe Feeding do it they are amazing with long tongues, All in...More
title: A must see when in Singapore

description: I've been coming to the zoo yearly since the birth of our first child. There was almost no changes to the place. High entrance fee of $30+ and yet photographers are still seen everywhere trying to sell you $20 photographs. Animal feeding experience is important...More
title: To be honest, the zoo needs a makeover

title: Good

description: like a top notch zoo with many animals and a great atmosphere for them, only thing i didnt like was seeing the Polar bear alone. Else it was very nice going to the place.
title: Very nice

description: Like a cross between a zoo and a theme park. Great for kids. They have some amazing animals on display, including (believe it or not) a polar bear with its own temperature controlled enclosure!
title: Good

description: We loved this zoo. Small monkeys roaming freely in the trees at the entrance was really exciting. Loved that we were able to hand feed a number of animals including Giraffes, Elephants and our favourite White Rhinos. Costs $5 per person per animal so make...More
title: Really great zoo

description: Its well maintained and animals are well kept. White Tiger is there. and Polar bear . Kangaroo. theres lot of walking . so wear comfort shoes.
title: lovely place

description: Being a Singaporean I am immensely proud of our zoo as it is definitely one of the best in the world. I am quite a regular to the zoo and I would love to share some tips to all of you to make your trip...More

description: Is truly vast and well maintained. Need to walk and spend atleast four hours to cover all of the areas. Well maintained too
title: Well maintained Zoo---Singapore
